traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The crabman can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crabman makes two attacks with its pincers.

actions.name: Pincers
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the crabman doesn’t have another creature grappled already. The target is restrained until the grapple ends.
